name: Fishy Business (itch) (emsuit)
description:
Unfortunately, the cutscenes do not work here, so here are the links to those videos. Play the 1st video after pressing start (before you press Q to go on to the next scene). Play the 2nd video when you have pressed Q and completed the game to where your screen turns black.

1st cutscene:

2nd cutscene:

You are just a normal fish living in the park pond when you see a beautiful woman and fall in love.  You wish to be with her, but there lies a problem; she has a CEO boyfriend/husband. You must find a way to take the CEO's identity and collect items in the city to solidify your disguise and be with the woman of your dreams.

- Utilized RPG Urban Pack tilemap/sprites

- Rest of content besides music was created by myself
